newsitem.title: GREECE: HELLENIC TOURISM TENDERS GOLF COURSE IN SALONICA.
newsitem.headline: HELLENIC TOURISM TENDERS GOLF COURSE IN SALONICA.

text.p: The Hellenic Tourism Organisation (EOT) announced an international public bidding competition with sealed bids for the construction and long-term use of a 18-hole golf course in Epanomi, Salonica.

In an ad in the Financial Times, EOT said the bidding will be carried out at the offices of the directorate of exploitation at Voulis 7 on Monday September 9 before a bidding committee set up for this purpose.
Interested parties may obtain the invitation text from EOT offices. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
